name: Pumpkin Stageplay
description:
This is my first attempt at making a game in unity! I wanted to recreate the paper mario artstyle so it started as a test to get the 2d sprites to turn around while moving, I eventually expanded it to be set on a stage and added a simple dialogue system! 

Use Arrow keys to move, Tab advances text, use mouse to select your dialouge, Space makes your character turn

Make sure to hit the fullscreen button so you can see everything properly!

(Resolution is a bit messed up on web so try downloading it to your pc!)
